department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Temporary help services for federal government departments and agencies
description: The procurement is for the provision of temporary help services to federal government departments and agencies. It is intended to issue multiple Standing Offers to qualified Offerors as the result of this Request for Standing Offer process.
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: EW479-212624E Temporary Help Service - Manitoba
#### Solicitation Details
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3979248519
* **Publication Date**: April 25, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 10, 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None specified
* **Expected Contract End Date**: May 31, 2024
* **Expected Contract Extension**: One additional year, if required

#### Tender Status
* **Status**: Expired
* **Category**: Service (SRV)

#### Technical Specifications
* **Services Required**: Temporary help services to federal government departments and agencies in one or more of the geographical areas listed in Annex "A" Statement of Work
* **Period of Provision**: Services to be provided on an "as and when requested" basis

#### Procurement Details
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Variations or combinations of the above methods
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Trade Agreements**: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Contact Information
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Contact Person**: Melanie Perrin (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: [melanie.perrin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:melanie.perrin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16086307?extsite=MTYwODYzMDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16086307?extsite=MTYwODYzMDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Additional Information
* **End User Entities**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Brandon, Manitoba, and Winnipeg
* **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Voluntary Set-Aside for Aboriginal Business
